analysis.description:
TimeCountBonusFeature.currentMilestone (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#586-603) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- milestones[i].closed == 0 && now < closeTime

MintTokensFeature.mintTokens (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#368-374) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#369-374)

RetrieveTokensFeature.retrieveTokens (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#395-401) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#399-401)

TeamWallet.withdrawTokens (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#770-780) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20token.transfer(_to,ERC20token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#775-777)

ITO.finish (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#804-816) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#808)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#812)

Reentrancy in ITO.mintTokensByETH (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#790-802):
	External calls:
	- _tokens = super.mintTokensByETH(to,_invested) (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#796-800)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#800)
	- softcapAchieved (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#800)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#161-162) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x37268a039f845354e293922e0ca7fdd4ef0332f8.sol#140) is not in mixedCase
